info.name: EMS Admin API
info.description: Complete API collection for Employee Management System Admin - Node.js with Sequelize and MySQL

request.description: Check if the API is running

Get meetings for user using USP_GetMeetingsForUser
Get tickets for assignee using stored procedure USP_GetTicketForAssignee
